LanguageData.AT_Aphidextract-stim.label: Aphidization surgery
LanguageData.AT_Aphidextract-stim.description:
It is a surgery that modifies the body to cause genetic modification to drain the nutrient-rich body fluid.

 It has the side effect of damaging the brain due to extreme irritation.

 Anties have no effect.
It is a surgery to increase the viability by injecting Refleum into the body of Anties.
LanguageData.CureAntyTransitionRefleum.label: Remove TransitionRefleum
LanguageData.pheromone-stim.label: Stimuate pheromone glands
LanguageData.pheromone-stim.description: Stimulate Anty pheromone glands to produce concentrated pheromone.
